review: Not what I expected. Very limited apps and most of the movies are $6 to $20 which I feel is expensive. Response time is slow and the only thing I use it for is Netflix since I cannot browse the Internet.
author: Ceceilia

review: I like it needs more free movies or perks
author: Amazon Customer

review: One of the best purchases I made! Love all the options and the Netflix and everything! So much fun and all my music connects. No more itunes. All Amazon!Sometimes it has trouble with the internet but it is nothing a quick restart doesnt fix.
author: Carissa Sherry

review: Love this.  Have been watching a lot of movies.  Would recommend it to anyone.  Glad I am a prime member.
author: Amazon Customer "LFox"

review: Great item...there is no lag like other comparative devices.
author: Isaac Sharon

review: Doesn't mention that you have to plug it in to the wall to power it.
author: Elizabeth Cate

review: Trouble downloading. Internet said it was not there problem. But Amazon said it was there problem. Mmmm
